condition.title: Problem
condition.p: I received a "Document could not be loaded" error message when trying to open a document stored on a HTTPS connection.

cause.title: Cause
cause.p: This is most likely caused when the server uses a self-signed or invalid certificate.

steps-informal.p:
If you encounter this issue, the system administrator can do the following:
Go to the Administration Page and click on Connection.
Select the Automatically accept a security certificate, even if invalid option.
Click Apply.
